title: LeNevukhei HaTekufah
enDesc: LeNevukhei HaTekufah (“For the Confused of the Period”) is Rav Moshe Avigdor Amiel’s last work. It describes his outlook on Judaism, covering topics like belief in God, the Godliness in people, Jewish ethics, and perspectives on Jewish History.
enShortDesc: Rav Amiel’s last work, addressing topics like belief in God and the Godliness in people, Jewish ethics, and Rav Amiel’s perspectives on Jewish history.
